alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia Basin of Washington; Yakima Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 11:33PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Benton and southeastern Yakima Counties through MIDNIGHT PDT... At 1132 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sunnyside, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sunnyside, Grandview, Toppenish, Granger, Zillah, Mabton, Satus and Buena. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Columbia Basin of Washington; Yakima Valley
